"Manon!":
"That's not what I meant.
Why would you help someone like me?"

"Manon, you're my best friend.
I'm always going to save you, no matter what."

"Didn't we say we'd do this as a team?
All three of us together to the end, right?"

"So for you to disappear like that
and go off on your own..."

"That was more of a shock than
any secret you could've been keeping."
"You can talk to us about anything."

"I-I've... been involved in the
development of ARKS here, all this time..."

"But the experiment on Halpha...
I had no idea it was going to be that bad..."

"Back then, I had no concern
for anything around me."

"As long as I could focus on what
interested me, that's all that mattered."

"That's what I'd tell myself so
I could stay blind to the reality."

"So I did as I was told
and went to Aelio Town..."

"That day, when they introduced
Dark Falz into the experiment..."

"Even if I did, it wouldn't change anything.
It couldn't change anything..."
"I didn't want you all to hate me!"

"I'm sorry as well.
For not being able to notice anything."

"Wait, you two.
I want to talk to him."

"He plotted the war between
the ARKS and the DOLLS!"

"But I want to know why.
Why he would do something like that."

"...But before that, I'd like you all
to show me your strength."

"Let me bear witness to the
strength that bested Dark Falz!"
"Stop! Why do we have to fight?!"
